response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value and has the potential to significantly impact your business. After careful consideration, we propose an offer of $950,000 for this exceptional item. We believe this price reflects not only its worth but also presents an opportunity for both parties to benefit. Should you have any questions or wish to discuss further, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 950000}
